summary.overview: The CU02 transaction provides user management functionality for administrators to update user information in the CardDemo application. It allows authorized users to modify user details such as names, passwords, and user types through an interactive screen interface.
business_functions: Session Validation - Verify user has valid session and redirect to sign-on if needed
User ID Input and Validation - Accept and validate User ID for the user to be updated
User Record Retrieval - Look up existing user information from the security database
User Data Display - Show current user details including name, password, and user type
Field Modification - Allow updates to first name, last name, password, and user type fields
Change Detection - Identify which fields have been modified from original values
Update Validation - Ensure all required fields are populated before saving changes
User Record Update - Save modified user information to the security database
Update Confirmation - Display success message when user information is successfully updated
Screen Navigation - Handle function keys for clearing fields, saving changes, and returning to previous screens
Error Handling - Display appropriate error messages for validation failures or system issues

CU02.program_overview: User management interface for updating user information and credentials
Administrative menu interface for admin users
Main menu interface for regular users

datasource_summary.name: User Security File (USRSEC)
datasource_summary.function: Stores user security and profile information including user ID, password, first name, last name, and user type. Used for user authentication and maintaining user account details.
